sources.title: Rosario (1971)
sources.description: Rosario y Carlos, esposos, forman parte parte de una compañía de teatro. En una escena de celos, ella debe disparar y matarlo. Carlos ha tenido una aventura con Zulma, otra actriz de la compañía, lo que no ha ocultado. La normalidad vuelve al matrimonio, y ese mismo día en la escena final del drama que representaban Rosario y Carlos, ella mata accidentalmente a su marido. Alguien cambio la pistola.... TRANSLATION: Rosario and Carlos, husband and wife, form a theater company. In a scene involving jealousy, she's supposed to shoot and kill him. Carlos has had a fling with Zulma, another company actress, something he has withheld. Normality returns to the marriage and on that same day pf the final scene of the drama representing Rosario and Carlos, she accidentally kills her husband. Someone has changed the gun...

metadata.Plot: A woman accidentally kills her husband while performing in a play.
metadata.Writer: Rogelio A. González, Arturo Moya Grau, Miriam Salinas de González
metadata.Actors: Marga López, Enrique Lizalde, Zulma Faiad
